name: AI Playground
title: The BioImage Archive AI Gallery
subtitle: Explore AI-ready image data and how AI models perform on different datasets
body_text: In this page you can explore AI-related datasets and models. You can browse a selection of AI-ready datasets curated to facilitate model development. You can also explore the outputs of several models from the BioImage Model Zoo on a dataset to get an idea of what is the most suitable model for a specific image. Or you can investigate how a model works on different datasets and see how widely applicable the model is.
